title: Spanish Court Approves Moving Body of Franco From Mausoleum
text:
Spain’s highest court approved the government’s plan to exhume the body of former dictator Francisco Franco from a monumental mausoleum and rebury him in a more modest cemetery, rejecting an appeal by Franco’s family.

The decision by Spain’s Socialist government to rebury Franco has sparked a debate about whether doing so in a lower-profile site would heal or reopen the wounds of Spain’s civil war and dictatorship. Few Spanish voters or politicians are overtly nostalgic for the Franco era, but many Spaniards would rather let...
description: Spain’s highest court approved the government’s plan to exhume the body of former dictator Francisco Franco from a monumental mausoleum and rebury him in a more modest cemetery, rejecting an appeal by Franco’s family.
